description: Veracity is an open source version control and bug tracking system for Windows, Mac OS X, and Linux. Together with SourceGear�s hosting solution, onVeracity.com, Veracity is a complete DVCS solution that offers great extras like scrum burndown charts, a wiki, build management and an iPad app.
summary: Veracity is an open source version control and bug tracking system that offers a complete DVCS solution that offers great extras like scrum burndown charts, a wiki, build management and an iPad app.
author: SourceGear
